In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the specific properties, comparisons, and related objects mentioned. These entities include "slightly higher," which is a comparison of an unspecified property value between the PEBDTPD and POBDTPD polymers. The term "LUMO level" is a property value related to the energy levels of electrons in a material. The "PEBDTPD polymer" and "POBDTPD polymer" are also property values, representing specific types of polymers being compared in the paragraph.
